div.p: This code system http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-epr-mhealth/CodeSystem/ch-ehealth-codesystem-deletionstatus defines the following codes:

tr.td: Expected behavior: No action requested. This value can also be sent to undo the other options.
Expected behavior: Document shall be deleted.
Expected behavior: This document shall not be deleted after the time period for the deletion of out-dated documents as defined in the law.

description.value: Additional metadata about deletion status on the DocumentReference

definition.value: Expected behavior: No action requested. This value can also be sent to undo the other options.
Expected behavior: Document shall be deleted.
Expected behavior: This document shall not be deleted after the time period for the deletion of out-dated documents as defined in the law.
